sentences.sContent: Royalty and government leaders from all around the world are gathering in Japan.
sentences.sCn: 来自世界各国的王室和政府首脑们正聚集日本。

synos.tran: 皇室；[税收]版税；王权；专利税

remMethod.val: royal(王族的) + ty → 王族(成员)

trans.tranCn: 王族； 专利权税， 版税； 王权
trans.tranOther: The members of royal families are sometimes referred to as royalty
